info.name: OverbiteFF - Mozilla FTP Directory Style 29.0
info.description: Fork of http://userstyles.org/styles/95379/overbiteff-mozilla-ftp-directory-style with fixes for Firefox Australis (29.0)
info.additionalInfo: This userstyle is a fork of OverbiteFF - Mozilla FTP Directory Style with various fixes to get it working properly on Firefox 29.0. Also, there are 3 languages included: English, German and Dutch. If you want to change the language you have to comment line 103 and 108 and decomment the lines according to your preference. Lines 103 and 108: English Lines 104 and 109: German Lines 105 and 110: Dutch Changes 2014-05-31: - Text-files (index 0) opened inline are now having line breaks Changes 2014-05-01: - Root and Parent directory icon fix - Font-weight in header fixed Changes to original: - Firefox Australis fixes - 3 languages included - Style enabled for text files (index 0) To Do: - Add some more languages - Add more icons for Windows and Mac - Easily change language (maybe with :lang-pseudoclass) - ...
